title: Analyze Talent Pipeline for a Critical Role
description: A workforce planning analyst is reviewing the talent pipeline for the 'Lead Data Scientist' role to identify any risks.

tasks.description: Identify the critical role in the workforce planning tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst selects the 'Lead Data Scientist' role.

tasks.description: Review the list of potential internal successors for the role.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst finds there is only one identified successor, and they are not yet ready for the role.

tasks.description: Flag the role as 'high risk' due to a weak internal pipeline and recommend initiating an external search to build a bench of candidates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst updates the workforce plan with the risk assessment and recommendation.
